knimeNode.name: Frost
knimeNode.shortDescription: Fastareader with a Realistic and Optimal Sequence-simulator for a Trio

fullDescription.intro: Frost simulates realistic and robust trio data using mutation and recombination events. It creates 6 fasta outputs for a trio (parents and child) from one fasta. Multiple chromosomes can be submitted too. Please upload one file only.

option.name: Path to the Fasta file to upload

fullDescription.option: Mutation rate (The rate will be the given value times 1e-8. Select 1.5 for a rate of 1.5e-8. Default: 2.36)
Total number of possible recombination positions (Default: 1000)
Enter a random seed number in order to experiment with the parameters

ports.outPort:
6 fasta files for a trio. Record files are saved as flow variable
Cell 0: Fasta output for father haploid chromosome 0
Cell 1: Fasta output for father haploid chromosome 1
Cell 2: Fasta output for mother haploid chromosome 0
Cell 3: Fasta output for mother haploid chromosome 1
Cell 4: Fasta output for child haploid chromosome 0
Cell 5: Fasta output for child haploid chromosome 1
